K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:208b-1: a'arya tr'a ya stri ngsha tpa ri brta n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:208b-3: 'phags pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:208b-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:208b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:208b-7: bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na shing yongs 'du'i drung na aar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:208b-8: sku skrun pa'i yum la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:208b-12: mthu chen po sha stag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-0: byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri @209a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-1: nyis stong thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-3: spobs pa thogs pa med pa phal cher 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas de na bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-4: de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu zla ba zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-5: zla mchog ces bya ba gnyis 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-6: de nas lha'i bu zla ba stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-7: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-9: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-12: khyod su'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'dod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla bas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-0: gang dag @209b bdag la sman dang sems can gzhan la sman slad zhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-1: sems can kun la snying rje snying brtse legs par bskyed nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-2: byang chub rdul bral bdud rtsi 'tshal zhing don du sgrub bgyid pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-3: sh'akya sengge bdag ni de dag don du zhu ba zhu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-4: gang dag ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa bye bar spyod bgyid cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-5: sdug bsngal spong la 'gro ba thams cad kyang ni grol bar bgyid; ;gang dag sems can kun la sems snyoms sbyor ba snyoms par bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-6: bdag ni mi 'dren de dag don du rgyal la zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-7: gang dag sangs rgyas mtshan mchog gsum cu rtsa gnyis rtags rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-8: sku spras rdul dang bral ba bsod nams zhing chen mthong gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-9: yon tan rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho rnams de dag 'dod bgyid pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-10: gzi brjid chen po de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-11: gang dag rtag tu skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes ma gtogs par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-12: gzhan du blo gros mi bskyed gzhan du sems par mi bgyid dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-13: gang dag nyan thos rang rgyal dag tu blo gros mi skyed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-14: rtsal rab brtan pa de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-15: gang dag rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags mnyam par sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-16: smad dang bsngags dang bde dang sdug bsngal dag gis skyo mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:209b-17: 'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas shing bskyod ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-1: don du bdag ni zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-2: gang dag bdag phangs mtshungs 'drar gzhan dag la yang phangs par 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-3: srid pa gsum na tha dad 'byed pa ma mchis sbyor ba mnyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-4: gang dag byams par sems shing tshul 'chos tha ba skyon ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-5: skye bo de dag rnams kyi don du bdag ni zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-6: gang dag rtag tu sbyin dang tshul khrims dag cing rnam dag spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-7: bdag nyid spong bar bgyid kyi tshul khrims phung po gtong mi bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-8: gang dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid rnams legs par bsdams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-9: bdag ni dri med de dag don du rgyal la zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-10: gang dag bzod pa smra zhing legs par bsdams pa'i shes dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-11: sdug bsngal dang ni bsad dang bcings dang brdeg pa rnams kyang bzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-12: kun gyis dkrugs kyang khro ba dang ni bskyed par mi bgyid pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-13: nges par bgyid pa de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-14: gang dag mthu dang brtson 'grus stobs gnas dam pa'i don dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-15: 'jig rten don gyi slad du rgyu zhing bdag gi phyir ma lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-16: dkar po'i spyod pa rnams kyis mi ngoms rgya mtsho'i chab dang 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-17: yon tan rgya mtsho de dag don du rgyal la zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210a-18: gang dag rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs shas cher mi 'jug pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-0: gang dag nyon mongs sna tshogs pham bgyis 'phags pa'i ye shes @210b ldan; ;gang dag bsam gtan mngon shes rnam brtson rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-1: bsam gtan gnas pa de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-2: gang dag shes rab pha rol son cing ye shes mtha' yas ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-3: rtog dang kun rtog bral zhing spros pa ma mchis zhi bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-4: gang gis chos 'di dben zhing ya ma brlar yang rtogs gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-5: gang zag chen po de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-6: gang dag rdzu 'phrul shes la mkhas shing shin tu rab zhi spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-7: zhing rnams khrag khrig mchi la zhing du 'dzin pa'ang ma mchis dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-8: sangs rgyas khrag khrig phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas 'dzin pa'ang ma mchis pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-9: mthong na dga' ba de dag don du rgyal la zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-10: gang dag nyon mongs bdud dang bral zhing phung po'i bdud bcom dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-11: gang dag 'chi bdag bdud dang bral zhing lha yi bdud bcom dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-12: gang dag bdud kun ngas bcom nas ni byang chub reg gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-13: mun dang bral ba de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-14: gang dag nags dang tshal du bcas pa'i sa gzhi bskyod nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-15: byang chub rdul med ye shes mchog ni 'tshang rgya dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-16: gang dag sems gcig la ni shes pa ci mchis 'byung 'gyur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:210b-17: rdo rje lta bu de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-0: gang dag ye shes kun mkhas gzi brjid chen pos gzi bskyed @211a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-1: dang; ;gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas gdung phyir chos spyod rab tu brtan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-2: gang dag 'dren pa dang ni dge 'dun mkhas rnams dgyes rgur sbyor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-3: de dag don du srid gsum dag na bdag ni zhu ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-5: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po dang ye shes kyi khyad par dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa rnams lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-7: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba shes pa dang ldan pa rnams lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-9: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-12: bstan pa gcig pa shes pa rjes su 'thob pa rnams lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-14: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zab mo'i tshul khrims can bag mchis par spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba rnams lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-16: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-0: khyod kyis go @211b cha chen po bgos pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-1: 'gron pa phal po che sgrol bar 'dod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-2: chos kyi sgron ma chen po spar bar 'dod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-3: chos kyi gru chen po sgrol bar 'dod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-4: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar 'dod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-5: chos kyi rnga bo che chen po rdung bar 'dod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-6: chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po sgreng bar 'dod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-7: chos kyi tog chen po gzung bar 'dod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-8: shes rab kyi snang ba chen po bya bar 'dod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-9: ye shes chen po'i rjes su 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams dang; ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-10: de lta bur yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa khyod legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-12: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la byos shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-13: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par shes pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-14: ye shes kyi khyad par dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-15: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba shes pa dang ldan pa yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:211b-16: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-1: bshad pa gcig pa shes pa rjes su 'thob pa yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-2: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams zab mo'i tshul khrims can bag yod par sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yin pa ngas khyod la bstan to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-6: lha'i bu zla bas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;lha'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-9: mngon par shes pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-10: ye shes kyi khyad par dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin te; bzhi gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-11: lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-12: chos thams cad shes pa la'ang mkhas la chos thams cad la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-14: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-17: mngon sum du gyur pa'ang yin la chos thams cad kyang chos nyid dang mthun par sbyor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-18: chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs par chos gzhan ci'ang yang dag par mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212a-20: de la chos thams cad tshul gcig pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-0: sngon @212b gyi mtha' thams cad ji ltar stong pa de kho na bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha' yang stong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-1: da ltar byung ba gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-2: lha'i bu de ltar na dus gsum stong pa nyid la rnam par mi rtog pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-3: ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-13: de la ji ltar chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-16: bdag nyid kyi kun nas slong bas kun nas bslang ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-17: des chos thams cad dran pa nye bar bzhag pas kun nas bslang par rig nas bdag la mngon par zhen pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-18: de bdag la mngon par zhen pa med pas chos gzhan rnams slong bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-19: chos gang yang mi shes shing ma bslangs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-20: de la mngon par zhen par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-21: de mngon par zhen pa med pas na chos rnam par gzhag par yang byed la chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-23: de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad nam mkhas dang 'dra bar shes she na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:212b-26: sems tsam du zad la sems de'ang gzugs med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-1: rig par byed pa ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-3: sems de'ang sems kyi chos nyid kyis yongs su btsal kyang mi rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-4: sems gang gis sems yongs su btsal ba'i sems de'ang mi rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-5: de sems mi dmigs pas chos thams cad mi dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-6: chos thams cad mi dmigs pas chos gang yang mtshan ma'am rjes su yang dag par mi mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-7: chos thams cad la chags par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-8: chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang 'dra bar shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-10: nam mkha' ma skyes shing yongs su ma grub pa de bzhin du des chos thams cad shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-11: ji ltar nam mkha' zhes bya ba de'ang dben pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-12: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ming tsam du zang de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-14: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas chos nyid dang mthun par sbyor zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-16: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di la so sor yang dag par bslab na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-17: chos 'di dag thams cad gcig gis gcig mi shes shing mi mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-18: mig gis kyang rna ba mi shes shing mi mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-19: rna bas kyang mig mi shes shing mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-20: snas kyang lce mi shes shing mi mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213a-21: lces kyang sna mi shes shing mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-0: lus kyis kyang @213b yid mi shes shing mi mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-1: yid kyis kyang lus mi shes shing mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-6: des de chos kyi dbyings dang 'dra bar shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-7: de lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-8: yul drug las chos gang snang bar gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-11: gang phyi rol rig par byed pa'i nang gi chos gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-13: gang nang rig par byed pa'i pha rol gyi chos gang yang med do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-14: des de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong bas chos gang gi'ang skye ba'am; 'gag pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-15: gnas pa yang dag par mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-19: gnas pa'ang med pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-21: lha'i bu; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-25: gtan du mi skye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-26: de de ltar chos thams cad la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang ldan pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-27: chos nyid la ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-28: chos thams cad kyang chos nyid dang mthun par sbyor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:213b-30: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-6: lhun po yi ni steng du rgyal ba gshegs snyam bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-7: bdag gis brtags na lhun po'i zom na bzhugs pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-8: bdag nyid kyang ni rgyal po'i khab na mchis pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-9: lhun po'i rtse mo de nyid na yang mchis pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-10: grong khyer mnyan yod na yang 'jig rten mgon po ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-11: srog chags bye ba mang po dag la chos ston mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-12: de dag na yang bdag dang sh'a ri'i bu dang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-13: nyan thos gzhan rnams gang lags de dag mthong bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-14: sh'akya dag gi nang du bsod snyoms gshegs pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-15: yangs pa nas ni slar gshegs pa'ang mthong bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-16: w'a ra n'a sir yang ni de bzhin mthong bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-17: thams cad du yang bdag nyid kyi ni lus kyang mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-18: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-19: tshogs dang lhan cig bsod snyoms dag la rgyu ba mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-20: ma dros mtsho yi nang dag na yang nyan thos bcas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-21: bsod snyoms zhal zas gsol ba bdag gis mthong bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:243b-22: de bzhin nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling dag na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-1: khrig mang po'i don mdzad mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-2: thams cad du ni moonggal bu yang rdzu 'phrul gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-3: stobs kyis 'gro ba rnams ni 'dul bar bgyid pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-4: de bzhin du yang shar gyi lus 'phags gling dag na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-5: mi rnams la ni chos rnams sna tshogs ston pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-6: de na yang ni bdag dang sh'a ri'i bu dag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-7: gzhan yang nyan thos gang lags de dag bdag gis mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-8: de bzhin sa bla ba yi lha yi gnas rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-9: bar snang dag na chos ni ston cing bzhugs pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-10: chos kyi mnga' bdag dam pa khyod ni 'jig rten skyong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-11: bzhi po dag la chos rnams ston cing bzhugs pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-12: de bzhin du yang 'thab bral lha rnams nang du mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-13: de nas sh'akya sengge dga' ldan dag tu mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-14: rab 'phrul dag dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dag na yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-15: mgon po nyan thos rnams dang bcas pa bdag gis mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-16: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag na tshangs pa bye ba la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-17: chos rnams ston cing bzhugs pa bdag gis mthong bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-18: thams cad du yang bdag gi lus dang de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-19: gzhan yang rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams ni bdag gis mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-20: gtsug lag khang dang 'chag sa shing gi gnas rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-21: phug rnams gang na sngon chad sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244a-22: thams cad du'ang sh'akya sengge ci 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-0: de 'dra'i chos kyi @244b rgyal po bdag gis mthong bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-1: dpa' bo khyod kyi chos nyid 'di ni bdag gis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-2: mthong nas bdag ni ngo mtshar rmad du 'dzin par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-3: sangs rgyas 'od mdzad de dag rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-4: 'di 'dra de dag ngo mtshar rab tu che ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-5: rnam 'dren sum cu gsum na bzhugs par ma bas kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-6: dzambu'i gling na thams cad du yang snang zhing bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-7: grong rnams dang ni yul 'khor grong khyer dag na yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-8: kha dog mthun pa yis ni chos rnams ston cing bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-9: 'jig rten mgon po khyod ni ji ltar mthong ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-10: de snyed kyi ni sh'a ri'i bu dang gsus po che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-11: ka pi na dang nam gru k'a tya na'i bu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-12: gang po dang ni rab 'byor 'od srung mthong bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-13: thos pa rgya mtsho lta bus dge ba kun dga' bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-14: kun tu sangs rgyas rnams la zhu ba bdag gis mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-15: thams cad du yang bdag gi lus ni mdog dang rtags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-16: mtshungs shing lhag pa ma mchis bdag gis mthong bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-17: sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab rnams la phyag 'tshal zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-18: bdag gis lhun po'i zom la ched du brjod pa brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-19: bdag gi spu yang zing zhes bgyid de gus pas gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-20: yan lag lnga po rnams kyis kyang ni phyag bgyis lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-21: sgra skad chen po dag kyang yongs su grags par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:244b-22: stong gsum sa gzhi dag kyang rab tu g-yos par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-0: lhun po'i rtse mo 'di yang kun du snang @245a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-2: rgyal ba des pa dag gi mthu ni mthong gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-3: de ltar bdag ni shin tu rings pa'i tshul gyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-4: mi mchog ga la bzhugs pa der ni bdag mchis te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-5: chos kyi rnam par dbye ba mkhas pa khyod la zhu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-6: rgyal pa de bzhin gshegs rnams ji ltar rnam par 'phrul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-7: dzambu'i gling dang lha yi 'jig rten dag dang ni; ;lho phyogs dang ni shar phyogs byang gi phyogs rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-8: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang ni bar snang gnas bzhugs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-9: rgyal ba rnams kyi de nyid gang lags bdag la gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-10: ston pa chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di mthong bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-11: deng ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-12: de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas theg pa 'di dag lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-13: bdag nyid dman par gyur pa deng du mya ngan bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-14: gal te bdag sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-15: byang chub tu ni da ltar sems kyang bskyed pa zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-16: bcom ldan bdag gi zag pa zad pas bgyir ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-17: bdag ni sangs rgyas ye shes 'di yi snod ma lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-18: ji ltar rgya mtshor rin chen don du song song na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-19: kyi hud nor bu rin chen por te mching bu blangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-20: byang chub bor nas nyan thos gyur pa gang lags pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-21: sems can rnams kyang nga ni de 'drar mkhyen par mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245a-22: sems can dman pa ngan pa'i lta ba can dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-0: @245b rgya chen byang chub tu ni sems kyang skye mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-1: brtson 'grus ldan zhing mthu rtsal brtan pa gang lags pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-2: de dag sangs rgyas ye shes la ni 'dun pa skyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-3: mgon po bdag ni thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-4: ye shes mchog zhugs gang lags pa la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-5: sh'akya sengge bzhin du de dag rnam par 'phrul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-6: bdag ni 'di la yid gnyis mi 'tshal dogs ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-9: khyod kyi yul ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod kyis mthong zhing lta bar zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-10: moonggal gyi bu; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-11: sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pas kyang kun shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-12: rnam par shes par mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-13: nyan thos phyogs gcig pa la spyod cing phyogs gcig gi shes pa dang ldan pa khyod kyis lta ga la shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-15: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:245b-16: de'i bar du 'khor ma 'ongs pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-0: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos bcom @246a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-1: ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas lus 'bar zhing 'od zer dag 'gyed bzhin du de'i tshe tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skad kyis bsgo ste de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-2: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams su yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-3: de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba shin tu dkon; ;au dumba ra'i me tog ji lta ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-4: 'dren pa rnams mthong ba yang de dang 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-5: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-6: bsod nams stobs dang ldan zhing bu stong dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-7: rin chen bdun ldan 'dod pa gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-8: de ni song la sangs rgyas chos nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-9: brgya byin tshangs par 'gyur bar su 'dod dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-10: 'dir ni lha mi'i bde ba gzhan dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-11: dga' zhing rtse la rtag tu bde ldan 'dod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-12: de ni chos kyi rgyal po ltar song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-13: nyon mongs kun bskams zhi ba mya ngan 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-14: bdud rtsi reg dang rdzu 'phrul stobs gnas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-15: rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-16: de ni song la rgyal ba'i chos nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-17: rang sangs rgyas sam nyan thos 'gyur ba 'am //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-18: yang na stobs bcas dpung bcas bdud btul nas; ;sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog 'gyur 'dod pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246a-19: de ni chos kyi mnga' bdag bltar song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-0: de nas gnas brtan moonggal gyi bus bskul ba'i lha bye ba khrag khrig @246b 'bum phrag du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-2: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams myur ba myur bar shin tu rings par me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-5: phye ma khyer nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bus rdzu 'phrul de btang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis te dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-9: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ngas bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-14: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-17: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-18: zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-19: nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-20: rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:246b-21: ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-0: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams @247a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-1: bye ba phrag brgya yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-2: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-6: gling chen po bzhi pa 'di 'ba' zhig tu nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-8: ma yin no snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-10: khyod kyis de ltar blta bar mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-11: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin pa bzhin du nga chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-13: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-15: da dung ma'i mngal na gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-19: yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ngas yang dag par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-20: bam po gsum pa ste tha ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-22: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid kyi shar phyogs su gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khri nyis stong 'das pa na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med ces bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247a-23: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul bral blo gros zhes bya ba da ltar chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-0: gling chen po @247b bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-5: legs par bshad kyis byang bar byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-6: de na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-8: phal cher nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul bral blo gros des chos bstan pa re re la nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag 'dul bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-11: da ltar 'di na rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-12: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-13: phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba bstan pa de lta bu'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhi rnam par gzhag pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-16: stan gcig la 'dug pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-18: mngon par shes pa mngon sum du byed cing rnam par thar pa brgyad rjes su thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-19: ye shes chen po thob nas ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas rang gi me'i khams kyis rang gi lus mes sreg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:247b-20: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi thal ba'i bag tsam yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:248a-0: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston cing sems can rnams rnam par grol bar byed la rgyun mi 'chad @248a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:248a-1: par nyan thos rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:248a-6: gos rnams bsam pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:248a-8: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:248a-9: de na sems can rnams mngal na gnas pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:248a-11: sa gzhi chen po de'ang gser las grub pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:248a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral blo gros de'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:248a-15: bar ma dor 'chi ba med do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:255a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba'i blo gros de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:255a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:255a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas skyil mo krung bcas te skyil mo krung gcig gis gling chen po bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas nas 'od zer dag rab tu 'gyed pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:255b-20: chos rnams mi skye ba dang mthun pa'i bzod pa la 'god do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:255b-21: chos bstan pa gsum pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:255b-22: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:256a-3: mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:256a-4: chos bstan pa bzhi pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:256a-5: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:256a-6: dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:256a-8: chos rnams la mi skye bar bzod pa 'thob bo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:257b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyis khyab par byas nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs 'bum dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:257b-2: shing rta'i phang lo tsam dag gis sa chen po de dag la mi 'greng tsam du bkram ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:257b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lha dang mi'i sil snyan dag gi sgra 'byin to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:258b-14: gang zag tu lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:258b-17: ngo tsha mi shes pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:259a-7: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:264b-2: de bzhin du spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi brgya'i cha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:264b-10: rgyu tsam yang yang dag par bstan par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:264b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:264b-14: rdzu 'phrul dang ye shes dpag tu med pa dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:264b-17: sems can 'khor los bsgyur bar gyur ba de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po gang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:264b-18: rin po che sna bdun thob pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265a-1: gyur gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu gcig yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265a-4: bdag gi ston pa 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265a-5: 'di ltar che bar grags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265a-7: bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265a-8: de lta lags kyis kyang bdag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265a-9: rgyu'i rjes su 'gro ba'i chos thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu las dman par gyur pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas lan gcig sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265a-12: gang dag mos par bgyid la mos shing yid ches nas kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ye shes 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lha smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265a-14: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-0: @265b khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin du sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams la yid ches pa de dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-1: rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-3: log par ltung bar dogs pa med par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-4: de nas lha de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-7: tshangs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das las sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas tshig mthun par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-9: sems can gang dag gis ye shes 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-10: skyed par 'gyur ba de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-11: ji ltar da lta na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa de bzhin du de dag kyang rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-12: de bas na bdag cag gis 'di la som nyi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-14: the tshom za bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-15: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-21: tshangs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-22: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya ba'i phyir sil snyan 'bum [?] sgra phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:265b-23: lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-0: padma dkar po dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas thams cad la @266a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i lha khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-3: tshig 'di skad du ji ltar da ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i sgra sgrog pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du bla na med pa'i sengge'i sgra sgrog par gyur cig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-5: zla mchog gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-8: rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-11: kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-12: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa de bsod nams ji tsam skyed par 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-13: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-15: zla mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-18: rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag nyid kyang 'chad la gzhan dag la'ang ston pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-19: dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266a-22: 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na nyan thos kyi sems sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-0: rang @266b sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-1: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'ba' zhig tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-3: lha'i bu; rgya chen po la mos pa dbang po rnon po sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-4: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dga' ba skye bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-5: chung du la mos pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-8: rnam grangs 'dis na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-10: ci nas dkon mchog gsum gyi rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir gnas pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-13: gang dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir gnas pa de'i bsngags pa'i mtha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-14: bsod nams kyi mtha' sangs rgyas 'bum sku tshe'i tshad bskal par zhugs pas kyang bstan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-21: rnam grangs 'dis kyang gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:266b-22: gzhan dag la ston pa de bsod nams tshad med pa skyed par 'gyur bar mkhas pas de ltar rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces @267a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-7: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-8: sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha'i bu zla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-12: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-18: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-19: 'phags pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-20: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a warma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-004:267a-21: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
